attributes.action: Entitle young carers caring for their disabled parents the right to recieve money form the government for caring.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am pledging this petition because adults caring for partners receive government money for caring after their partner when young carers (under the age of 18) care for their parents and get nothing in return. They get no real free time other than going to and from education sites during the day. To be honest, It's like being a slave.
